notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell amplification.
abilities.description: Places a debuff when you attack enemies, causing them to do 35% less spell damage for 4 seconds.

additionalInformation: Mage Slayer does not work with illusions
name: Mage Slayer
description: Forged by a secret order in The Third Age of Praxa'cia to fell the False King.
tips: Very effective against spellcasters due to its ability to reduce spell damage.
